game.name: Extreme Speed Car Racing Simulator Game 2019
game.description:
Again a highly addictive and challenging racing track welcomes you here on atmegame.com! You can play this latest car game on PC, mobile phone, tablet and iPhone or iPad without download. Would you like to try it out? Join Extreme Speed Car Racing Simulator and be prepared to drive a completely different racing car on the asphalt road! The controls are very simple and graphics are soothing for eyes. Grab your vehicle and show the world that you are a true racing freak!

There are multiple cars to select from in this HTML5 racing game. Try out the unique supercar or get a chance to select from a wider array of upgrades! Your every successful racing attempt will reward you with some useful cash through which you can look into the performance upgrades. Use your money to upgrade your engine and decorate your vehicle with your favorite paint and rims. Make sure that vehicle looks nice when it enters the streets of a wonderful city.

There are multiple models like One-Way Traffic, Two-Way Traffic, Time Attack and Speed Bomb to select from. Try to fight hard against the clock to help your vehicle reach the finish line timely! Be careful and try not to disturb your racing experience through the street traffic in this car driving simulator! Avoid an accident to get extra points! Play other top car driving simulating games for boys and girls for free!
